t: Amazon.com : Jarritos Soda Variety, 150 fl oz (Pack Of 1) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: If you love Jarritos youre probably like me abs prefer the glass bottles. Although the add doesn’t say glass, all of the photos are of glass bottles and the weight is for glass. Unfortunately the product delivered was in plastic. Based on the cost, I was expecting glass and I think they knew what they were doing when they mislead me. There are no refunds so you can’t get them to return or exchange it. Buyer beware. ... Chorito seems to be a brand ...

t: Amazon.com: Jarritos Soda, Mandarin, Bottle, 12.50-Ounce (Pack of 24) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I was hesitant to order a case of glass bottles, since I thought they may arrive broken. To my relief they all arrived unbroken. The soda itself is really good. It's a Mexican brand made soda with real sugar and natural ingredients. If you like orange soda, you'll love Jarritos Mandarin.
